content: i enjoy feeling the knitted fabric change in density and watching the stitches disappear a top loading washing machine can be used for wet felting wool alpaca and a wool & mohair blend will felt do not use super wash treated not to felt wool cotton rayon silk or any synthetic yarns if using multiple colors they should be the same type of yarn novelty yarns can be carried along with a felting wool yarn for fun designer effects in felt projects bleached white wool does not felt and many off white and light colored wools do not felt well knitwits contemporary yarn shop 620 buttermilk pike crescent springs ky 41017 859-341-2423 www yarnstars com page 3 of 5 knitwits contemporary yarn shop junko nakada materials approx 100 yards of lamb s pride brown sheep bulky in your favorite colors 24 circular us #10 needles one stitch marker finished size and gauge unfelted 9 x 9 felted 8-1/2 x 8-1/2 or desired size approx 3 stitches pre-felted per inch but gauge is not that important directions abbreviations used k=knit k2tog knit two stitches together pm=place marker sl2p= slip two stitches purlwise sm= slip marker ssk slip first stitch knitwise slip next stitch knitwise insert left needle into the front of the two slipped stitches on the right needle and knit two stitches together rs=right side ws=wrong side page 4 of 5 knitwits contemporary yarn shop junko nakada knitwits mitered corner pot holders 6 garter ridges 3 garter ridges the pattern cast on 35 sts pm cast on an additional 35 sts row 1 rs knit to marker sm knit to last 2 stitches bring yarn forward sl2p turn row 2 ws knit to 2 st before marker ssk sm k2tog knit to last 2 stitches bring yarn forward sl2p turn repeat row 1-2 until 8 sts remain repeat row 1 rs turn next row ws knit 2sts ssk remove marker k2tog bring yarn forward sl2p 6 stitches remain next row rs k2togtbl k2tog k2tog 3 stitches remain do not turn begin i-cord loop all row slide stitches to other end of circular needle knit all stitches repeat until i-cord measures 4 cut yarn leaving a 10 use tail to attach i-cord to potholder weave in and trim all yarn ends and felt to desired dimensions bon appetite please watch so i make
